Question: For making an acrylic router base plate, what type of acrylic should I use?
Options: A) You want to use cast sheet acrylic. Extruded acrylic is not as good for processing, nor is it as durable as sheet acrylic. B) You want to use cast sheet acrylic. Extruded acrylic is better for processing, and more durable than sheet acrylic.
Answer: A

Question: how to remove a tick
Options: A) Clean the area around the tick bite with rubbing alcohol.    Get your fingers right down on your skin so you can grab as close as possible to the tick's head.    Pull up slow and firm. ...    Clean the bite area again, and your hands, with rubbing alcohol or soap and water. B) Clean the area around the tick bite with rubbing alcohol.    Get your tweezers right down on your skin so you can grab as close as possible to the tick's head.    Pull up slow and firm. ...    Clean the bite area again, and your hands, with rubbing alcohol or soap and water.
Answer: B

Question: Clean between keyboard keys.
Options: A) Stick post it note between keys. B) Stick tissue paper between keys.
Answer: A

Question: How can you thwart people trying to "borrow" or steal your ink pens at work or home?
Options: A) Use a blue colored ink pen, but substitute a blue cartridge inside, that way it looks like you have a pen with red ink, usually people don't want to write or sign things in red so they'll pass it by. B) Use a red colored ink pen, but substitute a blue cartridge inside, that way it looks like you have a pen with red ink, usually people don't want to write or sign things in red so they'll pass it by.
Answer: B

Options: A) Using an electric blanket turned to the lowest setting, cover a beds bottom sheet. Place a top sheet and blanket on top of the electric blanket and make the bed as usual. Question: To blend in polymer clays in different shades of red.
Options: A) Roll each clay in different shades of red into logs and lay them next to each from light to dark. Press them to join them and roll them out. Fold over widthwise and repeat until shades are blended together. B) Roll each clay in different shades of red into logs and lay them next to each from light to dark. Press them to join them and roll them out. Fold over lengthwise and repeat until shades are blended together.
Answer: B

Question: how to put on a shirt?
Options: A) Make sure the shirt is facing the right direction and then flip to where the biggest hole is facing your body. Place your head in this hole and pull shirt over your head, while also placing your arms into the two separate arm holes and pulling down until on completely. B) Make sure the shirt is facing the right direction and then flip to where the smallest hole is facing your body. Place your head in this hole and pull shirt over your head, while also placing your arms into the two separate arm holes and pulling down until on completely.
Answer: A

Question: Bake an asparagus tart
Options: A) In a large mixing bowl, combine the cheeses, chives, eggs, cream, and pepper. Pour  the mixture under the pie crust and top with butter, and then arrange the asparagus on top of the filling. Drizzle the asparagus with oil and bake the tart for 25 minutes in an oven that’s been preheated to 400 °F (204 °C) B) In a large mixing bowl, combine the cheeses, chives, eggs, cream, and pepper. Pour the mixture into the center of the pie shell, and then arrange the asparagus on top of the filling. Drizzle the asparagus with oil and bake the tart for 25 minutes in an oven that’s been preheated to 400 °F (204 °C)
Answer: B
